documentType.description: Type of document, e.g., page (p) or content item (ci).

itemType.description: Type of content item, e.g., article, section.

originalLangCode.description: Original language of the content item.

langCode.description: Computed language of the content item.

contentLength.description: Token count of the content item (space split).

snippet.description: Snippet of the content item (first 150 characters).
